api/CreepysinStudios.WikiDotNet.html.keywords: Namespace CreepysinStudios.WikiDotNet Classes Error A class that represents a Wikipedia API error SearchInfo A class that contains information about a Wikipedia search. Currently only contains an int for the total number of results. Warning A class that represents a Wikipedia API warning. Often returned when invalid parameters/arguments are passed to the Wikipedia API WikiSearcher Provides functionality for searching Wikipedia for string, and returns an array of results WikiSearchQuery Contains an array of WikiSearchResult s and a SearchInfo WikiSearchResponse An object returned by the Wikipedia API that contains a WikiSearchQuery and RequestId WikiSearchResult A single search result from a Wikipedia search WikiSearchSettings A struct containing settings for use when searching with WikiSearcher . Search(String, WikiSearchSettings)
